title: Client permanently bugged?
body:
Hi team, 

Why is the client been bugged for several patches?

It doesnt open time to time, it freezes in champ select, you dont load into game sometimes?
There has been nothing mentioned on how to fix it either. 

Please can we have a public post on how to resolve this or can we have acknowledgment that there is a known bug and an eta on when it will be fixed. 

Thanks :)

replies.body:
I would say it's likely this issue is a local or very small-scale one, which would be why you haven't heard anything.

My first recommendation would be a client repair and a [connection check](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

If those don't resolve your issues, the next step I would recommend would be to talk to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
